title: Never got Icon for being Alpha Tester
body: Hey guys, is Riot still rolling out the icons for the Alpha testers? I've had the client for about two months now and logged in everyday since I got it. (way before 11/15/2016) I'm yet to get the icon, seems kinda dumb to be upset about but I figured I'd ask anyways.

replies.body: The icons are being distributed!  We aim to have it done by the 29th.  Hang on until then and thanks for testing!
